queries.name: Find more privileged groups
(Warning: edits the DB) Mark more privileged groups as HVT

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ '.*-(512|517|518|519|520|521|522|526|527|(?i)S-1-5-32-(544|547|548|549|550|551|552|556|557|580)|(?i)S-1-5-9)$' OR toUpper(g.samaccountname) = 'DNSADMINS' SET g.highvalue=TRUE RETURN g

queries.name: Find low value members of High Value Target Groups (1 hop)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m {highvalue: FALSE})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group {highvalue: TRUE}) RETURN p

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark low value members of High Value Target Groups as HVT (1 hop)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(o {highvalue: FALSE})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group {highvalue: TRUE}) SET o.highvalue=TRUE RETURN p

queries.name: Find objects containing names of some tier 0 software (SCCM, Veeam, ...)

queryList.query: MATCH (o) WHERE (o.samaccountname =~ '(?i).*(?:sccm|veeam|boomgar|tivoli|altiris|varonis|vcenter|vsphere|esx).*') RETURN o

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark objects containing names of some tier 0 software (SCCM, Veeam, ...) as HVT

queryList.query: MATCH (o) WHERE (o.samaccountname =~ '(?i).*(?:sccm|veeam|boomgar|tivoli|altiris|varonis|vcenter|vsphere|esx).*') SET o.highvalue=TRUE RETURN o

queries.name: Find low value objects with ACLs on high value objects (1 hop, max 200, Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=((a {highvalue: FALSE})-[r]->(b {highvalue: TRUE})) WHERE NOT (type(r) = 'Contains') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark low value objects with ACLs on high value objects as HVT (1 hop, max 200, Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=((a {highvalue: FALSE})-[r]->(b {highvalue: TRUE})) WHERE NOT (type(r) = 'Contains') SET a.highvalue=TRUE RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH (m) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: Direct groups of owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {owned:true}), (g:Group), p=(u)-[:MemberOf]->(g) RETURN p

queries.name: Unrolled groups of owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.owned=TRUE WITH m MATCH p=(m)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Most exploitable paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (5 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (3 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Owned users with permissions against GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Connections between different domains/forests

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b) WHERE NOT a.domain = b.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Connections (ACEs only) between different domains/forests

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b) WHERE NOT a.domain = b.domain AND r.isacl = True RETURN p

queries.name: Can a user from domain A do anything to any computer in domain B (Warning: VERY Heavy)

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select destination domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN $result + '=>' + n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

WITH split($result, "=>") as selectedDomains WITH selectedDomains[0] as sourceDomain, selectedDomains[1] as destDomain MATCH (n:User {domain: sourceDomain}) MATCH (m:Computer {domain: destDomain}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin*1..]->(m)) WHERE NOT n = m RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with a path to DA

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(g) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with a path to High Value

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}),(n {highvalue:true}),p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(n) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users and where they are AdminTo

queryList.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable users who are members of high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND u.hasspn=true RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with passwords last set > 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE n.hasspn=true AND WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: AS-REProastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegations

queryList.query: MATCH (c {unconstraineddelegation:true}) RETURN c

queries.name: Constrained Delegations (with Protocol Transition)

queryList.query: MATCH (c) WHERE NOT c.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND c.trustedtoauth=true RETURN c

queries.name: Constrained Delegations (without Protocol Transition)

queryList.query: MATCH (c) WHERE NOT c.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND c.trustedtoauth=false RETURN c

queries.name: Resource-Based Constrained Delegations

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[:AllowedToAct]->(c) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems (without domain controllers)

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark unconstrained delegation systems as high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers SET c2.highvalue = true RETURN c2

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned principals to unconstrained delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned:true}) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Between users (1 hop, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u1:User { enabled: TRUE } )-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink]->(u2:User) WHERE NOT(u1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between users (3 hops, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u1:User { enabled: TRUE } )-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink*1..3]->(u2:User) WHERE NOT(u1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between computers (1 hop, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(c1:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink]->(c2:Computer) WHERE NOT(c1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between computers (3 hops, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(c1:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink*1..3]->(c2:Computer) WHERE NOT(c1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Find computers admin to other computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c1:Computer)-[r1:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p UNION ALL MATCH p = (c3:Computer)-[r2:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r3:AdminTo]->(c4:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Between enabled users and computers (1 hop, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink]->(c:Computer) WHERE NOT(u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between enabled users and computers (3 hops, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink*1..3]->(c:Computer) WHERE NOT(u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between enabled computers and users (1 hop, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(c:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink]->(u:User) WHERE NOT(u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Between enabled computers and users (3 hops, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(c:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink*1..3]->(u:User) WHERE NOT(u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Objects with the AddAllowedToAct or WriteAccountRestrictions right on an enabled computer

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g {enabled: TRUE})-[:AddAllowedToAct|WriteAccountRestrictions]->(c:Computer {enabled: TRUE}) RETURN p

queries.name: Miscellaneous direct ACLs from enabled objects (1 hop, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u1 {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|Enroll|ManageCa|ManageCertificates]->(u2) WHERE NOT(u1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') AND NOT(u2.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') AND NOT(u1.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN') AND NOT(u2.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Miscellaneous direct ACLs from enabled objects (3 hops, max 200)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u1 {enabled: TRUE})-[:AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|Enroll|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..3]->(u2) WHERE NOT(u1.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') AND NOT(u2.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_') AND NOT(u1.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN') AND NOT(u2.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN') RETURN p LIMIT 200

queries.name: Logged in Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=(a:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[r:HasSession]->(b:User {enabled: TRUE}) WITH a,b,r MATCH p=shortestPath((b)-[:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(a)) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with local admin rights

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User {enabled: TRUE})-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer {enabled: TRUE}) RETURN p

queries.name: Domain admins sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {enabled: TRUE})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = (c:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Privileged users sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {enabled: TRUE})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group {highvalue: TRUE}) MATCH p = (c:Computer {enabled: TRUE})-[:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with adminCount, not sensitive for delegation, not members of Protected Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-525" WITH COLLECT (u.name) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g2:Group) WHERE u2.admincount=true AND u2.sensitive=false AND NOT u2.name IN protectedUsers RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled Domain/Enterprise Administrators, not sensitive for delegation and not members of Protected Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: TRUE, admincount: TRUE})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ '.*-525$' WITH COLLECT(u.objectid) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User {enabled: TRUE, admincount: TRUE, sensitive: FALSE})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group) WHERE NOT u2.objectid IN protectedUsers AND g2.objectid =~ '.*-(512|519|(?i)S-1-5-32-544)$' RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users, members of high value groups, not sensitive for delegation and not members of Protected Users (Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: TRUE, admincount: TRUE})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ '.*-525$' WITH COLLECT (u.objectid) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User {enabled: TRUE, sensitive: FALSE})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group {highvalue: TRUE}) WHERE NOT u2.objectid IN protectedUsers RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Groups that can change user passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN DISTINCT m[.]name,  COUNT(m[.]name) ORDER BY COUNT(m[.]name) DESC

queries.name: Groups of High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Non Admin Groups with High Value Privileges

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE NOT g.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Computer and User Objects

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users never logged on and account still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Users logged in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords last set in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' RETURN p

queries.name: View all GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH (g:GPO) RETURN g

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark all GPOs as High Value Target

queryList.query: MATCH (g:GPO) SET g.highvalue=TRUE RETURN g

queries.name: Find if any low value object has interesting permissions against a GPO (1 hop)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(o {highvalue: FALSE})-[:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark any low value object with interesting permissions against a GPO as HVT (1 hop)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(o {highvalue: FALSE})-[:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink]->(g:GPO) SET o.highvalue=TRUE RETURN p

queries.name: Find if any domain user has interesting permissions against a GPO (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows XP

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'XP' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2000

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2000' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2003

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2003' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2008

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2008' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows Vista

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'VISTA' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 7

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '7' RETURN c

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Local Admin Rights

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins and their admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN m

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark Top Ten Computers with Most Admins as HVT

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) SET m.highvalue = true RETURN m

queries.name: Top 20 nodes, 5 nested max, not DA, not HVT, most group deleg rights

queryList.query: MATCH (daGroup:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(domainAdmin) WHERE daGroup.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' WITH COLLECT(domainAdmin) AS domainAdmins MATCH (admGroup:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(domainAdm) WHERE admGroup.objectid ENDS WITH '-544' WITH domainAdmins, COLLECT(domainAdm) AS domainAdms MATCH p=(u)-[r1:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group)-[r2]->(n) WHERE r2.isacl=true AND NOT u IN domainAdmins AND NOT u IN domainAdms AND NOT u.highvalue=true WITH u, COUNT(r2) AS count_ctrl ORDER BY count_ctrl DESC LIMIT 20 RETURN u

queries.name: Top 10 computers, 5 nested max, not DC, most group deleg rights

queryList.query: MATCH (dcGroup:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(domainControllers) WHERE dcGroup.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(domainControllers) AS domainControllers MATCH p=(u:Computer)-[r1:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group)-[r2]->(n) WHERE r2.isacl=true AND NOT u IN domainControllers WITH u, count(r2) AS count_ctrl ORDER BY count_ctrl DESC LIMIT 10 RETURN u

queries.name: Find machines Domain Users can RDP into

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' RETURN p

queries.name: Find Servers Domain Users can RDP To

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' RETURN p

queries.name: Find what groups can RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:CanRDP]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users that are part of the ‘Global Administrator’ Role

queryList.query: MATCH p =(n)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin*1..]->(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All On-Prem users with edges to Azure

queryList.query: MATCH  p=(m:User)-[r:AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor]->(n) WHERE m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure VM

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZVM) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure KeyVault

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their Groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZUser)-[r:MemberOf]->(n) WHERE NOT m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure AD Groups that are synchronized with On-Premise AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n

queries.name: Find all Privileged Service Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:AZServicePrincipal)-[r]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Owners of Azure Applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZOwns]->(g:AZApp) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n

queries.name: Find enabled Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n

queries.name: Find objects with the ManageCa or ManageCertificates right on Certificate Authorities

queryList.query: MATCH p=(o)-[:ManageCa|ManageCertificates]->(c:GPO {type: 'Enrollment Service'}) RETURN p

queries.name: Show Enrollment Rights for Certificate Template

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Template...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:Enroll|AutoEnroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN p

queries.name: Show Rights for Certificate Authority

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Authority...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:ManageCa|ManageCertificates|Auditor|Operator|Read|Enroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Enrollment Agent Templates (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`User Specified SAN` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Find Unsecured Certificate Templates - Domain Escalation (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Find Unsecured Certificate Templates - PKI (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unsecured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and g<>n and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true and NONE(rel in r WHERE type(rel) in ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates']) RETURN p

queries.name: Find users with a plaintext attribute that can RDP into something

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p1=(u1)-[:CanRDP*1..]->(c:Computer) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find users with a plaintext attribute that belong to high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find users with a plaintext attribute that are kerberoastable

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True AND u1.hasspn=True RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE u1<>n RETURN u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)"  MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  u1<>n RETURN u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Add indexes to the database

queryList.title: Add index on the property Base SamAccountName
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX BaseSamAccountNameIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (b:Base) on (b.samaccountname)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Computer SamAccountName
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX ComputerSamAccountNameIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (c:Computer) on (c.samaccountname)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User SamAccountName
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserSamAccountNameIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.samaccountname)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Computer SamAccountName
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX ComputerOwnedIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (c:Computer) on (c.owned)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User Owned
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserOwnedIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.owned)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Group Owned
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX GroupOwnedIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:Group) on (g.owned)

queryList.title: Add index on the property GPO Owned
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX GPOOwnedIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:GPO) on (g.owned)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Computer Highvalue
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX ComputerHighValueIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (c:Computer) on (c.highvalue)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User Highvalue
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserHighValueIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.highvalue)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Group Highvalue
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX GroupHighValueIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:Group) on (g.highvalue)

queryList.title: Add index on the property GPO Highvalue
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX GPOHighValueIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:GPO) on (g.highvalue)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User Sensitive
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserSensitiveIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.sensitive)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User Admincount
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserAdminCountIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.admincount)

queryList.title: Add index on the property Computer Enabled
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX ComputerEnabledIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (c:Computer) on (c.enabled)

queryList.title: Add index on the property User Enabled
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX UserEnabledIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:User) on (u.enabled)

queryList.title: Add index on the property GPO Enabled
queryList.query: CREATE INDEX GPOEnabledIdx IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:GPO) on (g.enabled)
